Guy below me be like...
 blah blah angry fap angry fap angry fap

What a proper title for a hentai, all those fatties look like planetary bodies themselves. That fat fuck of a "man" shouldn't get a BBM tag, better yet, a DFFM tag (Disgusting Fat-Fuck). This repugnant shit has to stop! Why does the artist have to project by including a fat-fuck, and why do you cucks support this shit?? *puke* Only limp-dicked low-T beta-cucks who are too lazy and stupid to do the basics to just live a normal life and stop being fat, beat it to shit like this. Fatties are unhealthy, disgusting, leeches of society, a burden on the health-care system, sweaty smelly mf'ers who couldn't get laid to save their lives. On the flip side, it's SO easy dating nowadays, when 75% of the 'men' are fat/obese, getting all the hotties is such a breeze. After this Delta thing we got going on, we might get an Epsilon.... good, it'll thin the heard just a bit more. Obeast-cucks are PATHETIC!
he's not an ugly bastard lol he's just chubby
such a sad ending, needs a sequel. thanks anon from Spain for the translation.
